description: Daily snapshot table for personal loans marketing and lifecycle at LendingClub-style granularity. Includes application funnel, underwriting, funding, servicing, customer demographics, marketing attribution, and value metrics.

columns.name: snapshot_date
columns.description: Snapshot calendar date (day grain).

columns.name: customer_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the customer.

columns.name: application_id
columns.description: Unique loan application identifier.

columns.name: loan_id
columns.description: Loan identifier, populated only if the application was funded.

columns.name: first_touch_channel
columns.description: Marketing channel where the customer was first engaged (e.g., Paid Search, Social, Email).

columns.name: first_touch_subchannel
columns.description: Sub-channel classification (e.g., Brand, Non-Brand, Paid Social).

columns.name: first_touch_source
columns.description: Source of the lead (e.g., google, meta, web aggregator).

columns.name: first_touch_medium
columns.description: Marketing medium (e.g., cpc, email, organic).

columns.name: campaign_name
columns.description: Campaign name through which the customer was acquired.

columns.name: offer_name
columns.description: Offer variant shown to the customer.

columns.name: attribution_window_days
columns.description: Attribution window in days for linking leads to applications.

columns.name: application_dt
columns.description: Datetime when the loan application was created.

columns.name: app_status
columns.description: Application status (submitted, approved_not_funded, funded, in_funnel).

columns.name: preapproved_flag
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the customer was pre-approved.

columns.name: bureau_pull_flag
columns.description: Indicates whether a credit bureau pull was performed.

columns.name: kyc_pass_flag
columns.description: Flag for Know Your Customer (KYC) verification pass.

columns.name: doc_complete_flag
columns.description: Flag indicating whether all required documentation was completed.

columns.name: uw_decision
columns.description: Underwriting decision outcome (approve, decline, conditional).

columns.name: uw_decision_dt
columns.description: Datetime of underwriting decision.

columns.name: uw_reason_code
columns.description: Reason code for underwriting decision, if declined.

columns.name: risk_score
columns.description: Internal or external risk score for the applicant.

columns.name: fico_band
columns.description: FICO score band (e.g., 720-759, 680-719).

columns.name: fico
columns.description: Customer’s FICO score.

columns.name: dti
columns.description: Debt-to-Income ratio percentage.

columns.name: annual_income
columns.description: Customer’s reported annual income.

columns.name: employment_len_band
columns.description: Employment length bucket (e.g., <1y, 1-2y, 3-5y).

columns.name: grade
columns.description: Loan grade (A–G) assigned by underwriting.

columns.name: subgrade
columns.description: Loan subgrade (e.g., B3, C5).

columns.name: requested_amt
columns.description: Requested loan amount.

columns.name: approved_amt
columns.description: Approved loan amount (could be less than requested).

columns.name: approved_rate
columns.description: Approved interest rate at underwriting stage.

columns.name: term_months
columns.description: Loan term in months (e.g., 36, 60).

columns.name: purpose_code
columns.description: Purpose of the loan (e.g., debt_consolidation, credit_card).

columns.name: funded_flag
columns.description: Flag indicating if the loan was successfully funded.

columns.name: funded_dt
columns.description: Datetime when the loan was funded.

columns.name: funded_amt
columns.description: Actual funded loan amount.

columns.name: apr
columns.description: Annual Percentage Rate (APR) on the loan.

columns.name: origination_fee_amt
columns.description: Origination fee charged at disbursement.

columns.name: time_to_yes_minutes
columns.description: Time from application to underwriting decision (minutes).

columns.name: time_to_fund_minutes
columns.description: Time from underwriting decision to funding (minutes).

columns.name: principal_outstanding
columns.description: Outstanding principal balance on the loan as of snapshot date.

columns.name: interest_accrued
columns.description: Interest accrued up to snapshot date.

columns.name: principal_paid
columns.description: Principal paid to date.

columns.name: interest_paid
columns.description: Interest paid to date.

columns.name: fees_paid
columns.description: Fees paid to date.

columns.name: days_past_due
columns.description: Number of days the loan is past due.

columns.name: dpd_bucket
columns.description: Delinquency bucket (0, 30, 60, 90+).

columns.name: chargeoff_flag
columns.description: True if loan charged-off as of snapshot date.

columns.name: prepay_flag
columns.description: True if loan prepaid as of snapshot date.

columns.name: age_band
columns.description: Customer age band.

columns.name: income_band
columns.description: Customer income band.

columns.name: risk_segment
columns.description: Risk segmentation category (Prime, Near-Prime, Sub-Prime).

columns.name: primacy_flag
columns.description: Flag indicating if customer is a primary relationship holder.

columns.name: digital_active_flag
columns.description: Flag if customer is digitally active.

columns.name: device_type
columns.description: Device used by customer (mobile, desktop, tablet).

columns.name: segment_name
columns.description: Marketing or risk segment name.

columns.name: purpose_name
columns.description: Human-readable loan purpose.

columns.name: country
columns.description: Customer country.

columns.name: state
columns.description: Customer state.

columns.name: city
columns.description: Customer city.

columns.name: zip
columns.description: Customer ZIP or postal code.

columns.name: mkt_cost_month
columns.description: Monthly marketing spend for this channel/campaign.

columns.name: mkt_cost_daily_alloc
columns.description: Daily allocation of monthly marketing spend.

columns.name: revenue_daily
columns.description: Daily revenue recognized (interest + fees).

columns.name: servicing_cost_daily
columns.description: Daily cost of servicing allocated.

columns.name: ltv_to_date
columns.description: Cumulative lifetime value as of snapshot date.

columns.name: is_lead_day
columns.description: True if lead event occurred on snapshot date.

columns.name: is_apply_day
columns.description: True if application created on snapshot date.

columns.name: is_decision_day
columns.description: True if underwriting decision made on snapshot date.

columns.name: is_fund_day
columns.description: True if funding occurred on snapshot date.

columns.name: approval_rate_flag
columns.description: True if approval event occurred on snapshot date.

columns.name: funded_rate_flag
columns.description: True if funding event occurred on snapshot date.

columns.name: record_loaded_at
columns.description: Audit column: timestamp when record was loaded.
